/opt/intel/composerxe-2011.2.137/bin/intel64/icpc  -fPIC  -DDEBUG -g3 -O0 -inline-level=1  -shared -Wl,-soname,NBuddy-3delight.so -o NBuddy-3delight.so CMakeFiles/NBuddy-3delight.dir/__/user-ops/plugin.cc.o -L/home/marcus/naiad-0.6-x86_64/server/lib -L/opt/3delight-10.0.4/Linux-x86_64/lib -static-intel -lNi -l3delight -Wl,-rpath,/home/marcus/naiad-0.6-x86_64/server/lib:/opt/3delight-10.0.4/Linux-x86_64/lib:
